Attacks.Name: Ice Shard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Articuno gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target gain the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Freeze-Dry
Attacks.Effect: If the target character is Water-type or has a water ability, this attack deals 2 additional dice of damage.

Superpowers.Name: Pressure
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 3 must spend 1 additional power to use superpowers.

Superpowers.Name: Frozen Winds
Superpowers.Effect: Articuno may advance M. After the advance, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Hailstorm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of Articuno suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Rejuvenation
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Articuno and gain the Stagger special condition.
